item.title: [SPR-4335] {portlet-mvc, annotation based} SimpleMappingingExceptionResolver does not handle caught exceptions correctly
item.description:
This issue is identical to: http://jira.springframework.org/browse/SPR-4235 except the fix has not been propagated to portlet-mvc.

The problem finally affects the user by making it impossible to let SimpleMappingingExceptionResolver map the configurated error view. Instead it falls back to the default error view.
